verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Behold, the great Creator makes Himself a house of clay, a robe of virgin flesh He takes which He will wear for aye.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Hark, hark, the wise eternal Word like a weak infant cries! In form of servant is the Lord, and God in cradle lies.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: This wonder all the world amazed, it shook the starry frame; squadrons of spirits stood and gazed, then down in troops they came.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Glad shepherds ran to view this sight; a choir of angels sings, and eastern sages with delight adore this King of kings.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Join then, all hearts that are not stone, and all our voices prove, to celebrate this holy One, the God of peace and love.
